lessons.title: Campfire Music Session: Warmth and Social Bonding
lessons.caption: Friends relax by a campfire as one plays guitar and others sip warm drinks.

lessons.title: Smiling on a Woodland Path: Companionship in Nature
lessons.caption: A man and woman hike a forest path, laughing as sunlight filters through the trees.

lessons.title: Sunset Over a Lake: Friends Sharing a Golden Moment
lessons.caption: Four friends sit on a rocky viewpoint, drinking and watching the sun set over a wide lake.

lessons.title: Snowstorm Survival: Support in Harsh Weather
lessons.caption: Two people in heavy jackets huddle together in a blizzard, trying to stay warm.

lessons.title: Joy on the Beach: Friends Jumping in the Surf
lessons.caption: Three friends jump on a sunny beach holding hands, with the ocean behind them. Focus: clear description, inference, and TOEFL-style speaking, writing practice.

lessons.title: Searching in a Dark Forest: Caution and Curiosity
lessons.caption: A man and a woman stand in a dark forest at night, shining a flashlight and looking alert. Focus: clear description, inference, and TOEFL-style speaking, writing practice.

lessons.title: Desert Sunset Calm: A Couple on Sand Dunes
lessons.caption: A couple sits on warm sand dunes as the sun sets over the desert.

lessons.title: Mountain Group Selfie: Friends Capturing a Memory
lessons.caption: Four friends smile for a selfie on a mountain trail with a green valley behind them.

lessons.title: City View at Sunset: A Couple Above the Skyline
lessons.caption: A couple stands on a rooftop, watching the glowing skyline as the day ends.

lessons.title: Coastal Cliffs at Golden Hour: Waves and Wide Horizons
lessons.caption: A couple sits on a cliff overlooking the ocean coast at sunset, watching waves below. Focus: clear description, inference, and TOEFL-style speaking, writing practice.

lessons.title: Night Sky Camping: Pointing at the Milky Way
lessons.caption: Two campers sit by a lit tent and small fire, admiring a star-filled sky.

lessons.title: Kayaking Whitewater Rapids: Focus and Adrenaline
lessons.caption: Two kayakers paddle through fast whitewater; they wear helmets and life vests as water splashes around them. Focus: clear description, inference, and TOEFL-style speaking, writing practice.

lessons.title: Rock Climbing Ascent: Determination on a Steep Face
lessons.caption: Two climbers use ropes and safety gear to climb a high rocky wall above snowy terrain.

lessons.title: Busy Street Café: Conversation in the City
lessons.caption: Friends sit at a round table outdoors, chatting as pedestrians and bicycles pass by.

lessons.title: Boarding a City Bus: Public Transit Routine
lessons.caption: A woman steps onto a blue bus on a busy street, carrying a shoulder bag.

lessons.title: Crowded Crosswalk: Urban Movement and Noise
lessons.caption: A crowded city intersection with many pedestrians crossing; tall buildings, taxis, and steam create a busy downtown atmosphere. Focus: clear description, inference, and TOEFL-style speaking, writing practice.

lessons.title: Leaving the Subway: Starting a Workday
lessons.caption: A man in a suit climbs out of the subway into a bright city morning.

lessons.title: Outdoor Café Talk: Two Friends Sharing News
lessons.caption: Two women sit at an outdoor café table, laughing and talking over drinks and dessert. Focus: clear description, inference, and TOEFL-style speaking, writing practice.

lessons.caption: A hiking couple pauses on a wildflower slope to admire a wide green valley and snowy peaks.

lessons.caption: Two hikers walk through a green forest, smiling as they chat on a sunny path.

lessons.title: Lakeside Camp at Dusk: Warm Conversation by the Fire

lessons.title: Quiet Embrace by the Lake: A Peaceful Romantic View
lessons.caption: A couple sits on a rock, wrapped in warm clothes, watching light over a lake and snowy mountains.

lessons.title: Safety Check on the Factory Floor

lessons.caption: This is collaborative learning in action. Focus: clear description, cautious inference, and TOEFL practice.
